abstract.p: 本文利用线性泛函构造采样级数，研究了一个覆盖几个误差的通用模型。并考虑了在无衰减假设条件下，Paley-Wiener函数类B2V(ℝd)的截断误差的最优边界。 In this paper, we study a general model that uses linear functionals to cover several errors in one formula, consider sampling series with measured sampled values for band limited signals without decay assumption, and obtain the optimal bounds of truncation errors for band limited signal functions from Paley-Wiener spaceB2V(ℝd).

sec.title: 摘 要
sec.p: 本文利用线性泛函构造采样级数，研究了一个覆盖几个误差的通用模型。并考虑了在无衰减假设条件下，Paley-Wiener函数类 B υ 2 ( ℝ d ) 的截断误差的最优边界。
关键词 :有限带宽函数，Whittaker-Shannon定理，局部采样，截断误差
